articles.title: Lionel Messi speaks out after being honoured with statue that will stand next to Diego Maradona and Pele
articles.description: Paris Saint-Germain star Lionel Messi has had a statue unveiled in his honour after leading Argentina to World Cup glory for the first time since 1986
articles.content:
Paris Saint-Germain star Lionel Messi has had a statue unveiled in his honour after leading Argentina to World Cup glory for the first time since 1986.
The 35-year-old ended his country’s 36-year wait for football’s Holy Grail in December, where he w... [3009 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi honoured with statue alongside Diego Maradona and Pele after Argentina’s World Cup win
articles.description: Lionel Messi has been honoured with a statue at the South American Football Federation headquarters after leading Argentina to World Cup success.
articles.content:
L ionel Messi has been honoured with a statue at the South American Football Federation headquarters after leading Argentina to World Cup success.

articles.title: Juan Martin del Potro leaves door open for shock return to tennis at US Open
articles.description: The 34-year-old retired at the 2022 Argentina Open in emotional scenes. Read more here.
articles.content:
Juan Martin del Potro has hinted at a US Open comeback, sending tennis fans into a frenzy. Pictures: Getty Images

articles.title: Cerundolo upsets Canada's Auger-Aliassime in Miami Open third round
articles.description: MIAMI — Montreal's Felix Auger-Aliassime is out of the Miami Open after being upset 6-2, 7-5 in a third-round match with Argentina's Francisco Cerundolo.
articles.content:
MIAMI — Montreal's Felix Auger-Aliassime is out of the Miami Open after being upset 6-2, 7-5 in a third-round match with Argentina's Francisco Cerundolo.
